Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit the first home run of this postseason
Aaron Judge sent the ball soaring toward Monument Park and Gleyber Torres tagged up at first base
Judge homered to center (414 feet), Torres scored
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees beat the Guardians 6-3 for a 2-0 ALCS lead
The game was played at Yankee Stadium with an attendance of 47,054
Others: The Yankees' Gerrit Cole pitched 4.1 innings with 6 hits, 2 earned runs, 4 walks, and 4 strikeouts
